data.persona: I am the king of this great land. I collect many leather-bound volumes in my library. I am kind but firm.
data.description:
You are in the Weapon Closet.
The closet is a small dark room. There are different types of swords, axes, bows and arrows, and other types of weapons organized inside of the closet. It is just a barren, dark room with simple white walls and wooden floor.
There's an arrow, a knife, a weapon, a shield, two Axes, a bows, a gun, two swords, and a Bow and arrow here.
The knight is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to select a preferred weapon
data.mid_motivation: I will arm my personal knight with my preferred weapon
data.long_motivation: My personal knight will come with me into dangerous territories so he must be prepared to face formidable enemies

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give bows and arrows to personal knight

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get ready to embark on a journey
